channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe; Cushion Den: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late; New TV: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A fire breaks out in 'Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday', then in 'Pups Save A S'more-Mergency', Humdinger goes camping, and has just one thing on his mind. (S11, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Lizzy's Lemonade Blaze:Mayor Humdinger and his kitties accidentally set Lizzy's Lemonade Stand and parts of Foggy Bottom ablaze. It's up to the pups to extinguish the fires! (S11, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Tyre Trouble: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres! (S8, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew helps Aaron Judge hit 100 home runs in 'The Crew Builds A Ballpark', then in 'The Crew Builds A Surf Bridge', the pups learn how to surf! (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
channel.desc: The hamsters mistake a party for an invasion in 'The Dragon Egg of Surprise', then in 'Cave of Coldness', Mondo goes into the A/C vents on a rescue mission. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing in 'The Rainforest Ritmo', then in 'The Magic Nut', Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Park; The Lifeboat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lucky Hamper; Jelly: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Potty Training; Trampolines: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Holly: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Jolly's Riding Club: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Tyre Trouble: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres! (S8, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Super Thinkers!: Gabby, Pandy and Carlita attend DJ Catnip's Super Thinker Camp, where they tackle the puzzles and obstacles so they can earn their rainbow capes and become Super Thinkers. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy discovers the forest in 'The Tour', and then in 'Smurfing a Masterpiece', Baby Smurf is the new Painter! (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Lily and Farmer have to save the village from a slobbering monster in 'Monster in the Village', then in 'Granny's Doll', Rowena is turned into Smurfette and takes her place in the village. (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin in 'Pups and the Werepuppy!', then in 'Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor', It's Cowboy Day, and Mayor Goodway faces the hazards of the ranch while sleepwalking.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs in 'Pups Save the Runaway Turtles', then in 'Pups Save the Shivering Sheep', Farmer Al's sheep run away, and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the twins see the rainbow in 'Rainbow's Lost Colours', then in 'Boots' Rubber Band Ball', Boots has to retrieve his ball after it lands in Cynthia the Centipede's yard. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Let's Make a Movie!: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Health Check; Skate Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mountain Climbing; Police Boat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Giants in the Meadow: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Windmill: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Olly and Chef uncover a mystery fruit's identity in 'Turon', then in 'Matzo Ball Soup', Olly must make soup without having the exact recipe! (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team in 'Pups Save the Soccer Game', and in 'Pups Save a Lucky Collar', Marshall wins a new collar, and he's sure it's bringing him good luck.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Paper Games: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard The Elf Pirate: Barnaby Elf's uncle, Redbeard the Elf Pirate, comes to visit the Little Kingdom, but he has lost his treasure. Everyone must help Redbeard track down the treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.
